name: Blink (itch) (Calcified_Mind)
description:
Welcome to WIZARD JAIL. 

Blink is a school project I did to learn the 3D parts of the unity engine! you can play 4 levels right now but I'd like to add a few more and improve a few things., like the audio mixing and scene transitions. 

You're in the wizard slammer for learning forbidden magic, which you're gonna use to break out of this shithole. the forbidden magic  "Blink"  teleports you a few meters infront of your previous location. Time to break some physics.
